agents.name: Agent1
agents.note: Completed US-022: Monitor battery backup voltage. Implemented BatteryMonitor class with GPIO ADC/I2C voltage reader, warning (11.5V) and critical (11.0V) thresholds, display alerts, graceful shutdown, database logging. 62 tests passing.
